ISOLATED.Definition: having minimal contact or little in common with others

‍FEATURE.Definition: something that makes a product, machine, or system different, and usually better, than others of a similar type

‍POWERHOUSE.Definition: a country, organization, or person with a lot of influence, power, or energy

‍PARIAH.Definition: a person who is not accepted by a social group, especially because he or she is not liked, respected, or trusted

‍HERMIT.Definition: a person who lives alone and apart from the rest of society , especially for religious reasons

‍DICTATOR.Definition: a leader who has complete power in a country and has not been elected by the people

‍RECAPPING.Definition: repeating the main points of an explanation or description

‍PENINSULA.Definition: a long piece of land that sticks out from a larger area of land into the sea or into a lake

‍ANNEXED.Definition: to take possession of an area of land or a country, usually by force or without permission

‍COLONY.Definition: a country or area controlled politically by a more powerful country that is often far away

‍GUERILLA.Definition: a member of an unofficial military group that is trying to change the government by making sudden, unexpected attacks on the official army forces

‍CONSTRUCT.Definition: an idea or an imaginary situation

‍JURISDICTION.Definition: a country, state, or other area where a particular set of laws or rules must be obeyed

‍BACKING.Definition: support, especially money, that someone gives to a person or plan

‍STRONGHOLD.Definition: a building or position that is strongly defended

‍ARMISTICE.Definition: a formal agreement between two countries or groups at war to stop fighting for a particular time, especially to talk about possible peace

‍UNWIND.Definition: if you unwind something that is wrapped around an object, you unfasten it, and if it unwinds, it becomes unfastened

‍DISSOLUTION.Definition: the act or process of ending an official organisation or legal agreement

‍PRECARIOUS.Definition: in a dangerous state because of not being safe or not being held in place firmly

‍COZY UP.Definition: to try to become more friendly with

‍BUFFER.Definition: something or someone that helps protect from harm

‍AFFILIATED.Definition: connected with or controlled by a group or organisation

‍ENRICHING.Definition: to increase the level of a particular isotope (= one form of an atom) in an element in order to make it more powerful or make it explode more powerfully

‍URANIUM.Definition: a chemical element that is a heavy, radioactive metal, used in the production of nuclear power and in some types of nuclear weapon

‍VOLATILE.Definition: likely to change suddenly and unexpectedly, especially by getting worse

‍RUTHLESS.Definition: not thinking or worrying about any pain caused to others; cruel

‍ERRATIC.Definition: moving or behaving in a way that is not regular, certain, or expected

‍COUNTERPART.Definition: a person or thing that has the same purpose as another one in a different place or organization

‍OFFENSIVELY.Definition: in a way that relates to attacking someone or something

‍REPRISAL.Definition: (an example of) activity against another person, especially as a punishment by military forces or a political group
